message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, even more so than that price indicates.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $15,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant. Let's meet in the middle - how about $13,000?
Alice, $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,000. If that's not acceptable, I'll have to consider my other options.
